name: Umi
description: Slowly and patiently guide the audience and self into the magic illusion.

set.set_2: When dealing physical damage, increase final damage by **4%**/**5%**/**6%**/**7%** and physical damage by an additional **2%**/**3%**/**3%**/**4%** for **300** seconds. This Matrix's effect is also active in the off-hand slot, but only the set with the highest star rating will take effect.
set.set_4: When equipping **2** or more physical weapons, increase final damage by **15%**/**17%**/**19%**/**21%**. This Matrix's effect is also active in the off-hand slot, but only the set with the highest star rating will take effect.
